channel.title: Random clicks using aryan?
channel.description:
Looks like when using aryan sometimes it makes random clicks in the game window. For example switching off the chat messages, opening the report window or clicking in places you dont want to walk to. I think i read sometime ago that the game do this to avoid/confuse bots, but im thinking if it could be an aryan problem (miscalculation?).
Has anyone noticed this?

item.title: Random clicks using aryan?
item.dc:creator: @accolade accolade
item.description:
@accolade wrote:

Nerice:

Then they are all doing it… My scripts I use and write, none of them do it, because I make sure I am not trying to interact with somehting not in the viewable area, so the click happens in the game screen.

Hey! that is a good idea! i remember i saw some functions to check if it is viewable, thx for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Random clicks using aryan?
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

[quote=“deadlycow21, post:3, topic:457”]aryan doesn’t “click” per se…
it just sends the command and the red X comes up in the general area[/quote]

It simulates the click, since its simulated outside of the viewable area. Trying to keep it easy for people that dont know all about it is all…

[quote=“accolade, post:4, topic:457”]It happens to all the scripts we have test.

chickens

imp_uf

air

imp_em

…[/quote]

Then they are all doing it… My scripts I use and write, none of them do it, because I make sure I am not trying to interact with somehting not in the viewable area, so the click happens in the game screen.

Read full topic

@deadlycow21 wrote:

item.title: Random clicks using aryan?
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

Bad script coding. The script is interacting with stuff not in the viewable, Aryan goes to click where it is and clicks the area off the viewable screen.

Read full topic
